message: Damn it. That was pretty immature, even for me...
Those brats just really get to me, you know?
I guess I'd better clean up the mess they left...
Sheesh...
I thought I heard something just now...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Whoooa?!"
S-Something fell outta the sky!
It looks like a man.
But... a man from the sky?
He's lying face down on the pavement.
He's not... dead, is he?

name: クリア
message: "U-Ughh..."
The man gets up, groaning.
Phew. He's alive...
My relief is fleeting, though. When the man looks up, I freeze.

He doesn't have a face!<k>
<?>
No, wait. That's a gas mask.

name: クリア
message: "...Well, that was unexpected."
The man looks around, ruffling his hair.
He seems fine... but it sounded like he hit the ground pretty hard.
And why is he wearing a gas mask?
He turns to look at me.
I blink and hold my breath, hoping he'll ignore me and go away.
No such luck. He walks right up to me.

name: クリア
message: "Master, I'm so glad you're alright."
Master?

name: クリア
message: "I followed the sound of your voice."
What the hell's he talking about?

name: クリア
message: "Is something wrong?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Um.... I think you've got me confused for someone else."

name: クリア
message: "Someone else?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I dunno who this 'Master' person is, but it's not me."

name: クリア
message: "No, you are my master, Master."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Like I said, you've got it wrong. I've never even seen you before."

name: クリア
message: "That's not true. I'm Clear. I carried you back here yesterday."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You carried me here?"
Yesterday... Come to think of it, I woke up here after getting sucked into that Rhyme battle.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wait... Are you the one who pulled me into Rhyme?"
I couldn't see the rabbit guy's face, and I think he had a similar outfit.

name: クリア
message: "No, that wasn't me. But I thought you were my master, Master, so I carried you here."
...We're going in circles.

name: クリア
message: "I heard your voice yesterday, Master."

name: クリア
message: "'Death and destruction.'"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What?"
That sounds kind of familiar...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where did you hear tha― Gah?!"
Suddenly, he pinches my cheeks.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oww! Ow! Thah hurs!"

name: クリア
message: "Master, you seem kinda different today. Looser, maybe? It's hard to describe."
The guy in the gas mask shakes his head with a sigh.
What is with this guy?!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Lemme go!"

name: クリア
message: "Okay."

Damn, that hurt... 
What's wrong with this guy?!
He cocks his head to the side, puzzled, as I rub my cheeks with tears in my eyes.

name: クリア
message: "Just to confirm, you are my master, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I told you I'm not!"

name: クリア
message: "I think you are."
I take some deep breaths, trying to cool my head.
Calm down. He's just trying to get you riled up.
I decide to turn the tables. He's playing dumb, but maybe he'll show his true colors if I piss him off enough.
If he was the rabbit head guy from yesterday, I have every intention of delivering some payback.
I launch a kick at his ass.

name: クリア
message: "Ahhh!"
He arches backward, clutching his butt.

name: クリア
message: "Oh, Master! Please don't do that!"
He sinks to his knees, wailing.

name: クリア
message: "Please, Master... It's already cracked... It can't take anymore..."
...Yeah. No way he's the same guy.
I should get this over with and send him on his way.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Anyway, I'm not your master, and I have work to do. Bye."

name: クリア
message: "What about me?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Go home!"

name: クリア
message: "Understood."
He nods obediently and starts digging around in his pockets.
Slowly, slowly, he pulls out...

...a vinyl umbrella.
How the hell did that fit in there?!
